dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your tarot reading business.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: Explore the range of tarot readings we offer.

general.title: General Reading
general.description: A broad overview of your current energy. Perfect for clients without a specific question.

love.title: Love & Relationship Reading
love.description: Focuses on romantic relationships (partners, exes, prospects). Explores love energy, loyalty, and the future of the connection.

career.title: Career & Business Reading
career.description: Provides direction on career paths, job choices, and business opportunities. Ideal for those considering resignations, interviews, or promotions.

finance.title: Finance Reading
finance.description: Examines financial energy, opportunities for prosperity, expenses, and investments. Can be combined with actionable advice.

spiritual.title: Spiritual & Healing Reading
spiritual.description: Reads auras, karma, past lives, and inner energy. Suitable for those needing self-reflection or emotional healing.

yesNo.title: Yes or No Reading
yesNo.description: A direct answer to one specific question. Quick and simple, perfect for express services.

timeBased.title: Time-based Reading
timeBased.description: Provides a forecast for a specific period, such as weekly, monthly, or yearly energy.

ppf.title: Past-Present-Future Reading
ppf.description: Highlights past influences, current situations, and future predictions.

soulmate.title: Soulmate / Twin Flame Reading
soulmate.description: Explores soul connections, spiritual relationships, and destined partners.

chakra.title: Chakra or Energy Reading
chakra.description: Assesses the balance of the body's energy centers or chakras.
